layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584

          text run at (0,0) width 774: "The COL element specifies attributes for a table column. In this test case, the COL element is used in conjunction with the SPAN"
          text run at (0,20) width 53: "attribute."
